jfxtras.labs.scene.control

Class BeanPathAdapter.FieldHandle<T,F>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jfxtras.labs.scene.control.BeanPathAdapter.FieldHandle<T,F>
  • Enclosing class:
    BeanPathAdapter<B>

    protected static class BeanPathAdapter.FieldHandle<T,F>
extends java.lang.Object

    Field handle to getAccessor() and getSetter() for a given getTarget().

      • FieldHandle

        protected FieldHandle(T target,
                      java.lang.String fieldName,
                      java.lang.Class<F> declaredFieldType)

        Constructor

        Parameters:
        target - the getTarget() for the MethodHandles
        fieldName - the field name defined in the getTarget()
        declaredFieldType - the declared field type for the getFieldName()

    • Method Detail

      • updateMethodHandles

        protected void updateMethodHandles()

        Updates the getAccessor() and getSetter() using the current getTarget() and getFieldName(). MethodHandles are immutable so new ones are created.

      • getAccessorType

        Returns:

        See Also:
        #deriveValueFromAccessor()

      • deriveValueFromAccessor

        protected F deriveValueFromAccessor(boolean isNullable)

        Gets an accessor’s return target value obtained by calling the accessor’s MethodHandle#invoke(Object…​) method. When the value returned is <code>null</code> an attempt will be made to instantiate it using either by using a default value from DFLTS (for primatives) or Class.newInstance() on the accessor’s MethodType.returnType() method.

        Returns:
        the accessor’s return target value

      • setTarget

        public void setTarget(T target)

        Binds a new target to the BeanPathAdapter.FieldHandle

        Parameters:
        target - the target to bind to
